Adventure Guildsman:
Our guild gathers information on happenings all over the world for those that need them. Basically, we're brokers.
It was quite a busy time when Faeron first emerged. The only channel of communication we had with the Spirit Realm was to go through the Ertheia!
Now I'm even busier, since I have to deal with those who come to exchange their Adventurer's Marks and Seals.
